title: Week 13 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Big Shimmy Returns - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/30
description:
Week 13 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 13 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 30th, 2021.
  
 (05:10) - Monday Night Recap: Seahawks at Washington Football Team
 (10:55) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (17:25) - NFL News
 (29:10) - Waivers
 (29:35) - WR Waivers
 (39:00) - RB Waivers
 (52:15) - TE Waivers
 (55:15) - DST Streamers
 (56:40) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
